# Exception Approval Review

## Approval Criteria Gap
Describe which approval criteria the system fails to meet.

---

## Exception Request Rationale
Explain why an exception is being requested.

---

## Risk and Governance Impact
Evaluate how granting an exception affects risk and governance integrity.

---

## Accountability Implications
Explain who is accountable if an exception-approved system causes harm.

---
